name: 3rd Person Camera! C3 Platformer Tutorial
description:
CONTROLS!

WASD to move. SPACE to jump.

J K or L for 3 different attacks.

I and M to change polar angle.

Y and H to zoom in and out (radial distance)

This game was created to demonstrate how to make a 3rd person orbital camera inside of Construct 3 for a platformer.  Check out the tutorial video on YouTube and let me know what you think!
